a piece of paper with a price on it that is attached to something in a shop
It’s difficult to put a price tag on such a project  (=say how much it costs).
a small ticket showing the price of something
There’s no price tag on this printer.
used to talk about the price of something, especially when this is very high
a project that could have a price tag in excess of $100 million
The governmentput a price tag of (=said the price would be) more than £2 billion on the shares it is privatizing in National Power PLC.
